children.subject: If i recall correctly, I thought Data8 + stat 88 satisfies the pre-Haas stat requirements, not Data8 + CS88?

history.content: From berkeley academic guide, data 8 + stat88 but not cs88 satisfies statistics requirement.

children.subject: Maybe this is helpful https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Lrw0X33OGt2lMlzQtDuQoQmbrPCMQ35VFVg7arfj4Zc/edit#heading=h.8n3ivmcj2lqn ? I'd also email CS advising

history.content: Next semester I am scheduled to take CS88 and CS61A together, because Data8+CS88 satisfies my pre-Haas requirement and CS61A satisfies my CS requirement. Online it says that I am not allowed to take CS88 after taking CS61A for credit. However, am I allowed to take them together given that they are both requirements for me? Thanks!
history.subject: Taking CS88 and CS61A Simultaneously

history.content: Next semester I am scheduled to take CS88 and CS61A together, because Data8+CS88 satisfies my pre-Haas requirement and CS61A satisfies my CS requirement.
